    • incrementToken

      public final boolean incrementToken() throws IOException
      Publishes the next, pending token from initialize(org.opengrok.indexer.analysis.Definitions, org.opengrok.indexer.analysis.StreamSource, org.opengrok.indexer.util.ReaderWrapper), if one is available.
      Specified by:
      incrementToken in class org.apache.lucene.analysis.TokenStream
      Returns:
      false if no more tokens; otherwise true
      Throws:
      IOException - in case of I/O error
